_comment: SonarQube rule → ESLint rule mapping for quality campaign alignment. Source of truth for quality-orchestrator agents.

typescript:S4325.fixHint: Remove the redundant `as Type` or `!` assertion — TypeScript already knows the type

typescript:S7776.fixHint: Convert array to `new Set([...])` and use `.has()` instead of `.includes()`

typescript:S7746.fixHint: Replace `return Promise.resolve(value)` with `return value`; replace `return Promise.reject(error)` with `throw error`
typescript:S7746.note: SonarQube-only rule. No ESLint equivalent. sonarjs plugin may cover in future versions.

typescript:S7753.fixHint: Use `.indexOf()` instead of `.findIndex()` when checking for simple values

typescript:S7763.fixHint: Use `export { Foo } from './bar'` instead of importing then re-exporting

typescript:S3735.fixHint: Remove `void` operator. For fire-and-forget promises, use a comment instead.
typescript:S3735.note: Conflicts with @typescript-eslint/no-floating-promises which recommends `void`. Configured with allowAsStatement:true to permit `void promise` pattern.

typescript:S4123.fixHint: Remove `await` — the value is not a Promise/Thenable

typescript:S1135.fixHint: Complete the TODO or convert to a tracked issue
typescript:S1135.note: INFO severity — tracked but not blocking. 100+ open TODOs in codebase.

typescript:S107.fixHint: Extract parameters into an options object

typescript:S3776.fixHint: Extract helper methods to reduce cognitive complexity below 15
typescript:S3776.note: Already configured in ESLint with threshold 15

typescript:S108.fixHint: Add logic to empty block or add a comment explaining why it's empty

typescript:S2486.fixHint: Handle the exception or remove the try-catch

typescript:S3358.fixHint: Extract nested ternary into a separate variable or if/else

typescript:S6544.fixHint: Don't return Promise from void-return lifecycle methods

typescript:S7718.note: SonarQube-only naming convention. Conflicts with ESLint _prefix convention.

typescript:S7059.fixHint: Move async operations from constructor to an init() method
typescript:S7059.note: SonarQube-only. Angular pattern: use ngOnInit instead of constructor for async.

typescript:S1607.fixHint: Remove xit/xdescribe or add a reason comment

typescript:S4030.fixHint: Use the collection's contents or remove it

typescript:S6551.fixHint: Don't use object in string context — access a specific property

typescript:S4043.fixHint: Use `.toSorted()` or move `.sort()` to a separate statement

css:S7924.fixHint: Increase text contrast ratio to meet WCAG 2.1 AA (4.5:1 for normal text)
css:S7924.note: CSS-only rule. Requires stylelint or manual fix. 6 open issues.

css:S4670.fixHint: Remove or fix the unknown CSS type selector
css:S4670.note: CSS-only rule. 1 open issue in perseus.css vendor bundle (excluded from ESLint).

typescript:S7764.fixHint: Use `globalThis` instead of `window` for cross-environment compatibility

typescript:S7735.fixHint: Swap if/else branches to remove the negation

typescript:S6571.fixHint: Use a type alias for long union types
typescript:S6571.note: SonarQube-only. sonarjs/use-type-alias may partially cover this.

typescript:S7778.fixHint: Use `arr.push(a, b, c)` in one call instead of multiple `.push()` calls

typescript:S4323.fixHint: Replace union type with a type alias for readability

typescript:S7780.fixHint: Use `String.raw` to avoid manual escaping of backslashes

typescript:S7765.fixHint: Use `.some()` instead of `.includes()` for complex predicates, or `.includes()` for simple values

typescript:S7771.fixHint: Use negative index with `.slice(-n)` instead of `.slice(arr.length - n)`

typescript:S7754.fixHint: Use `.some()` instead of `.find()` when only checking existence

typescript:S7785.fixHint: Use top-level await instead of wrapping in a promise chain

typescript:S1874.note: Already configured in ESLint as warn.

typescript:S4165.fixHint: Remove the redundant assignment — variable already holds this value

typescript:S7651.fixHint: Rename output binding to avoid standard DOM event names (e.g., `click` → `itemClick`)

Web:S6840.fixHint: Add correct `autocomplete` attribute to form inputs

Web:S7927.fixHint: Ensure the accessible name includes the visible label text
Web:S7927.note: Web-only rule. WCAG 2.5.3 Label in Name.

css:S4666.fixHint: Remove or merge duplicate CSS selectors
